Printify referendum data column names

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
printify_col_names.Rd

Renames referendum data column names to be ready to print. Useful e.g. to create publication tables.

printify_col_names(data)

Arguments

data

C2D referendum data as returned by rfrnds().

Value

A tibble.

Details

Column names unknown to this function are not changed.

See also

Other referendum data transformation functions: as_ballot_dates(), n_rfrnds_per_period()

Examples

c2d::rfrnds(country_code = "IT") |> c2d::printify_col_names()
#> # A tibble: 124 × 69
#>    `C2D ID`   Offic…¹ sudd.…² ISO 3…³ Country Subna…⁴ Munic…⁵ Polit…⁶ Date
